explains: n. 概论；普遍性；大部分

sentences.en: An account of such generality is of little value.
sentences.cn: 这种一般性描述没有什么价值。

sentences.en: This view is held by the generality of leading scholars.
sentences.cn: 大多数知名学者都持这种观点。

sentences.en: That there are problems with this kind of definition is hardly surprising, given its level of generality.
sentences.cn: 考虑到其笼统性，难怪这类定义会存在问题。
